title: First Look: The 2025 Liv Langma Is Lighter, Stiffer & More Aero Than Ever Before
content:
The 2025 Liv Langma frame in the top-flight Advanced SL model weighs a claimed 667 grams, thanks to a new manufacturing process that molds the front triangle as one piece.

Read the full article at First Look: The 2025 Liv Langma Is Lighter, Stiffer & More Aero Than Ever Before on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
